Description: Check that a coverage content type exists.
Check that an attribute definition exists.
Check that each attribute definition is sufficient (e.g. word count).
Check that an attribute domain is defined for each relevant attribute.
Check that enumerated domains are defined.
Check that an attribute measurement scale exists.
Check that attribute definitions are not simply the attribute name.
Check that attribute names are unique.
Check that attributes have a measurement precision defined.
Check that a storage type exits for each attribute.
Check that units are defined for each attribute that should have them.
Check that an entity checksum and algorithm are present.
Check that a description is available for every entity.
Check that the entity distribution URL is resolvable.
Check that all entities use non-propietary formats.
Check that each entity has a format specified.
Check that each entity has an identifier.
Check that a entity identifier type exists.
Check that a name is specified for every entity.
Check that a description of data quality practices and protocols used is present.
Check that an entity type exists.
Geographic coverage description should be present at the dataset level.
Check that a metadata identifier exists.
Check that the metadata identifier exists and is resolvable.
Check that provenance process step software is specified.
Check if a lineage source entity is specified.
Check that provenance information is present.
Check that an abstract exists and is of sufficient length.
Check that access control rules exists.
Check that a resource creator exists.
Check that a resource creator identifier exists.
Check that a distribution contact exists.
Check that a distribution contact identifier exists.
Check if each keyword has a type specified..
Check if a keyword thesaurus is present, indicating that the keywords are controlled.
Check if keywords are present.
Check that a resource landing page exists and is resolvable.
Check that a resource license exists.
Check that a detailed methods section is present.
Check that a publication date exists.
Publication date should not be in the future
Check that a publisher exists.
Check that a resource publisher identifier exists.
Check that a revision or creation date exists.
Check that a service location exists.
Check that a service provider is present.
Check that a service type exists.
Check that at least one spatial extent exists.
Check that a taxonomic extent exists.
Check that a temporal extent exists.
Check that the resource title is greater than 7 words and less than 20.
Check if the resource type is present and known.
